subject: Re: quoted-printable characters
body:
On 6/22/07, Tom Allison  wrote:

> MIME::QuotedPrintable seems to only do conversions to ASCII which
> screws up the conversion.

What's MIME::QuotedPrintable? I can't find it on CPAN.

    http://search.cpan.org

When you find out how to do what you want, or if you can fix
MIME::QuotedPrintable, you should consider making it into a module for
CPAN. Assuming, of course, that what's already on CPAN doesn't work
for you.

Cheers!

--Tom Phoenix
Stonehenge Perl Training

--
